item.koishitestmod.nagisa_dowsing_rod.no: No Valuales Things For Mika Found!
tooltip.koishitestmod.nagisa_dowsing_rod: The Nagisa will find you some mikaniums below the blocks you pointed.

right-click to surface to find if theres mikaniums below there.
Press Shift for more details
tooltip.koishitestmod.tasty_credit: Why not you just try to literally "consume" the credits?
